values.SMS Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 
Thank you for your interest in Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. 
Please call us back as soon as you can to schedule your intro class at no cost to you. 
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi !  
You contacted us two weeks ago about trying Gracie Barra Brazillian Jiu-Jitsu. 
Please let us know if you have a good time to come in for a trial class. 
If you're more comfortable attending your first class with a family member or friend, you're very welcome to. 
Kind Regards, 
${spaceAttributes('School Name')}
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi member('First Name')! 

Thank you for your interest in Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. 
Please call us back to organise your intro class at no cost to you! 
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi member('First Name')! 
This is ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and Self Defense. 
I wanted to send you a super quick reminder about your/your child’s intro class at ${Intro Scheduled Time}! 
Please come about 15 minutes early so I have time to get member('First Name') into the proper uniform size, introduce them to our amazing instructors, and answer any questions you may have. Make sure you bring water to help keep hydrated and simply wear slip on shoes on your feet. 
Here is our address ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}. 
We look forward to meeting you!

Hi member('First Name'),

We noticed you haven't been on the mats in a little while. We look forward to getting you back to
your training. Let us know when you'll be back, and if there is anything we can help with. 
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

Hi member('First Name'),
${spaceAttributes('School Name')} knows life gets busy, but we miss you on the mats! We are fired up to get you back
to your training. See you soon! 
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}
NO SCRIPT AVAILABLE

label: Leads-When intro does not attend the intro class

values.Template Name: When intro does not attend the intro class
values.SMS Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 
Sorry we missed you for your intro class! Please reply to this text to let us know when the best
time is to reschedule. We look forward to seeing you on the mats. 
Kind Regards, 
${submitterName}

Hi member('First Name'),  
I just wanted to send you a reminder that ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} was unable to process your last payment. 
Please contact the school to update your information.
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

I'm just following up about your last payment. We weren't able to process your
membership payment. This could be due to many different reasons. 
Please contact the school to update your information.

Kind Regards,
${spaceAttributes('School Name')}

Hi member('First Name'), 
We need your assistance.
For the past week, we have been trying to contact in order to update your financial information for your
membership. 
Please contact the school so we can get your account up to date.
Kind Regards,
${submitterName}

Hi member('First Name')! 
You're all booked in for your intro class at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} on ${Intro Scheduled Date}!
I will supply a uniform for you to wear for the intro class. Please arrive 15 minutes early so you have time to get changed and meet the instructors. Make sure you bring water to help keep hydrated and simply wear slip on shoes on your feet. 
Please confirm the booking by replying Y or N. 
Here is our address ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}. 
We look forward to meeting you! "

Add Mens information here..

https://${space}.gbmembers.net/#/kapps/services/forms/mens-registration?public&id=member('ID')

Hi member('First Name'),

We noticed you haven't been on the mats in a little while. We look forward to getting you back to
your training. Let us know when you'll be back, and if there is anything we can help with. 

${submitterName}

label: Leads-When intro does not attend the intro class

values.Template Name: When intro does not attend the intro class

values.SMS Content:
Hi member('First Name')! 
Thank you for your interest in Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu Jitsu. 
Please call us back as soon as you can to schedule your intro class at no cost to you. 
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi member('First Name'),  
We just wanted to notify you that ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} was unable to process your last payment. 
This could be for lost card, expired card, etc.  Please contact the school at ${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')} to update your information.  Thank you.
Kind Regards,
${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

Hi member('First Name')! 
Thank you for your interest in  ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Brazilian Jitsu.  We would love to organize a date for the complimentary trial class. It's a great opportunity for you to check our facility, meet our instructors and see if this is the perfect fit.  To make it easier for you we provided a link below, so you can learn more about our programs and book your free class online.  If you prefer to communicate through texting or phone call reply to this text with your preference. Looking forward to hearing from you.
https://www.gbarizona.com/book-online

${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}
${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

I'm just following up about your last payment. We weren't able to process your
membership payment. This could be due to many different reasons. 
Please contact the school to update your information.

${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team
${spaceAttributes('School Telephone')}

Hi member('First Name')! 
This is ${submitterName} from Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu Jitsu and Self Defense. 
I wanted to send you a super quick reminder about your/your child’s intro class at ${Intro Scheduled Time}! 
Please come about 15 minutes early so we have time to get member('First Name') into the proper uniform size, introduce them to our amazing instructors, and answer any questions you may have. Make sure you bring water to help keep hydrated and simply wear slip on shoes on your feet. 
Here is our address ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}. 
We look forward to meeting you!

Hi member('First Name'),
This is Gracie Barra Arcadia.  We wanted to say welcome to the team.  We are so excited for you to join our family.  Here is a link that has important information for you about our school and training.  If you have any questions please reach out.  We will see you on the mats.

${spaceAttributes('School Name')} Team

Hi member('First Name')! 
Just sending you a reminder for your intro class at ${spaceAttributes('School Name')} on ${Intro Scheduled Date}!
We will supply a uniform for you to wear for the intro class. Please arrive 15 minutes early so you have time to get changed and meet the instructors. Make sure you bring water to help keep hydrated and simply wear slip on shoes on your feet. 
Please confirm the booking by replying Y or N. 
Here is our address ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}. 
We look forward to meeting you! "

Hi member('First Name'), this is ${submitterName} from Gracie Barra Jiu-Jitsu. It was great to chat with you. Here is a quick video about our programs and training philosophy.

If you have any questions before your intro, feel free to text or call at your convenience.
We look forward to meeting you in person for your intro class on ${Intro Scheduled Date} at ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}.

Hi member('First Name'), 
We need your assistance.
For the past week, we have been trying to contact in order to update your financial information for your
membership. 
Please contact the school so we can get your account up to date.

${submitterName}

Hi member('First Name'), this is ${submitterName} from Gracie Barra Brazilian Jiu-Jitsu. It was great to chat with you. Here is a quick video about our programs and training philosophy.

If you have any questions before your intro, feel free to text or call at your convenience.
I look forward to meeting you in person for your intro class on ${Intro Scheduled Date} at ${spaceAttributes('School Address')}.
